alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 1:31PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Mobile and west central Baldwin Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 131 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Movico to near Semmes to 5 miles southeast of Big Point. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Bay Minette, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Spanish Fort, Creola, Stockton, Stapleton, Axis, Semmes, Tanner Williams, I65 And I165, Mobile Regional Airport, I65 And AL 225 and I65 And AL 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland
